attributes.action: kindly investigate the possibility whether people can enter or leave the freemasons freely and confirm the examples of any such persons that have left
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Human Rights Act 1998 and Rule of Law confirm that every man has the freedom to associate and to leave any association freely.

This petition requests the Prime Minister to kindly confirm whether members of freemasons can exercise this right freely.

Any examples of such persons would be an obvious proof.
